file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-12-03-04 - PROCTECTOR OVERHEAD PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PROCTECTOR OVERHEAD PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the overhead-panel assembly protector. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY OVERHEAD-PANEL ASSEMBLY PROTEC- ALL 25-12-03-000-801-A TOR - REMOVAL OVERHEAD-PANEL ASSEMBLY PROTEC- ALL 25-12-03-400-801-A TOR - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-12-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-12-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. OVERHEAD-PANEL ASSEMBLY PROTECTOR - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the overhead-panel assembly protector. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 20-13-10-000-801-A/400 CONTROL PANELS - REMOVAL (TYPICAL) ILLUMINATED PLACARD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL AMM TASK 20-13-10-000-802-A/400 (TYPICAL) COCKPIT VOICE RECORDER CONTROL UNIT - RE- AMM TASK 23-71-05-000-801-A/400 MOVAL AMM TASK 24-00-01-000-801-A/400 ELECTRICAL POWER CONTROL PANEL - REMOVAL AMM TASK 26-00-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 26-00-01-000-802-A/400 - ENGINE FIRE SHUTOFF & EXTINGUISHING HANDLE AMM TASK 26-21-01-000-801-A/400 - REMOVAL AMM TASK 28-20-04-000-801-A/400 FUEL CONTROL PANEL - REMOVAL AMM TASK 31-16-01-000-801-A/400 CIRCUIT BREAKER PANEL - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) To get access to the overhead-panel assembly protector, do as follows: (a) Remove the the circuit breaker panel (AMM TASK 31-16-01-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (b) Remove the cockpit voice-recorder control unit ( AMM TASK 23-71-05-000-801- A/400). (c) Remove the two engine fire shutoff/extinguishing handles ( AMM TASK 26-21-01-000-801-A/400). (d) Remove the fire panel (AMM TASK 26-00-01-000-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 26-00-01-000-802-A/400, as applicable). (e) Remove the fuel control panel ( AMM TASK 28-20-04-000-801-A/400). (f) Remove the electrical-power control panel ( AMM TASK 24-00-01-000-801-A/ 400). (g) Remove the remaining control panels (AMM TASK 20-13-10-000-801-A/400) and the illuminated placard assembly (AMM TASK 20-13-10-000-802-A/400). (2) Correctly identify all the harnesses. Make marks to show their locations. NOTE: The harnesses and their locations must be correctly identified to make the installation procedure easier. (3) Disconnect and remove the harnesses from the interior of the overhead-panel assembly protector. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (1) and bolts (2) that attach the overhead-panel assembly protector to the aircraft structure. (2) Remove the overhead-panel assembly protector from its installation position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Overhead-Panel Assembly Protector - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 225 226 B DET. A 1. SCREW (3) 2. BOLT (3) DET. B EM145AMM252873A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-12-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. OVERHEAD-PANEL ASSEMBLY PROTECTOR - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the overhead-panel assembly protector. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 20-13-10-400-801-A/400 CONTROL PANELS - INSTALLATION (TYPICAL) ILLUMINATED PLACARD ASSEMBLY - INSTALLA- AMM TASK 20-13-10-400-802-A/400 TION (TYPICAL) COCKPIT VOICE RECORDER CONTROL UNIT - IN- AMM TASK 23-71-05-400-801-A/400 STALLATION ELECTRICAL POWER CONTROL PANEL - INSTALLA- AMM TASK 24-00-01-400-801-A/400 TION AMM TASK 26-00-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 26-00-01-400-802-A/400 - ENGINE FIRE SHUTOFF & EXTINGUISHING HANDLE AMM TASK 26-21-01-400-801-A/400 - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 28-20-04-400-801-A/400 FUEL CONTROL PANEL - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 31-16-01-400-801-A/400 CIRCUIT BREAKER PANEL - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the overhead-panel assembly protector in position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-12-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Attach the screws (1) and bolts (2) that connect the overhead-panel assembly protector to the aircraft structure. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Connect all the harnesses that were removed during preparation I (3). Make sure that they are correctly installed. (2) Install the control panels as follows: (a) Install the circuit breaker panel (AMM TASK 31-16-01-400-801-A/400). (b) Install the cockpit voice-recorder control unit ( AMM TASK 23-71-05-400-801-A/ 400). (c) Install the two engine fire shutoff/extinguishing handles ( AMM TASK 26-21-01-400-801-A/400). (d) Install the fire panel (AMM TASK 26-00-01-400-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 26-00-01-400-802-A/400, as applicable). (e) Install the fuel control panel ( AMM TASK 28-20-04-400-801-A/400). (f) Install the electrical-power control panel ( AMM TASK 24-00-01-400-801-A/400). (g) Install the remaining control panels (AMM TASK 20-13-10-400-801-A/400) and the illuminated placard assembly (AMM TASK 20-13-10-400-802-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-12-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
